title: BERT for Humans: Tutorial+Baseline (Version 2)
description: Since I received great response from the community for my Original BERT kernel in the TF QA Competition and even some people reached out asking me to do a similar kernel for the Google QUEST competition  (as they are kinda similar as well), I was really motivated and here I am with another BERT for Humans thing, hope you enjoy it.
description_lemmatized: since received great response community original bert kernel tf qa competition even people reached asking similar kernel google quest competition kinda similar well really motivated another bert human thing hope enjoy
